name: Seals AI
headline: AI Employees for Wholesalers & Distributors
description:
Seals is a suite of AI Employees for Wholesalers & Distributors. Instead of relying on humans to quote, take orders, collect payments, place purchase orders and enter data into ERPs. We build AI Employees that do these manual repetitive tasks for the 700k wholesalers in the US.

We’re a team of three Computer Science majors, and Fernando launched and grew AT&T in Mexico to $120M ARR. Previously, we all worked together at our last YC-backed startup, building it to over $6M in revenue. It was there that we placed thousands of purchase orders with wholesalers.

We realized that almost every physical product comes from B2B sales in the supply chain. However, it turns out that most of these operations are still done manually through phone and email, involving tasks like quoting, taking orders, collecting payments, entering data into ERPs, and providing support. By automating these tasks with AI agents in a human-like manner, we are creating a massive opportunity to convert $100B of payroll expenses into software spending.

founders.name: Luis Mario Garcia, Founder
founders.description:
Co-founder & CEO of Seals AI (S24).

I am a second-time founder who built a YC-backed (W20) grocery delivery startup and grew it to $6.3M in revenue and 30K customers. I designed all the software, including Driver, Consumer, and Warehouse Apps. I was in founder mode acquiring customers, operating warehouses, launching cities, recruiting engineers, and fundraising. I personally delivered 1,000 orders to talk to users and build the product.

founders.name: Heber Garza, Founder
founders.description: Computer Science graduate. I am the founder & CTO of several venture-backed startups, including enterprise-grade software products. I have been writing code for the past 18 years. Before joining Seals, I led engineering at a YC-backed startup, scaling the software to 30,000 customers.

founders.name: Javier Gonzalez, Founder
founders.description: Computer Science graduate. I have been coding since I was 12 years old. At my first company, I built an app that reached 500,000 users by myself. I am a second-time YC-backed founder who built and scaled four complex software apps, think of the DoorDash stack.

founders.name: Fernando Huerta, Founder
founders.description:
I love technology because it is the bicycle of the mind. During my life, I have had the opportunity to:
1. Get a Computer Science degree and make the first internet connection in LATAM in 1989.
2. Launch AT&T in Mexico and grow it from $0 to $120M ARR as Marketing-Sales Director.
3. Deliver 300K grocery orders to 30k customers at Orchata a YC-backed (W20) startup.

# AI Employees that make more money for top B2B Wholesalers and Distributors

# Introducing fully human-capable AI Employees , designed to maximize bottom-line for top B2B Wholesalers.
Imagine training the ideal employee who works 24/7. Our AI Employees manage your wholesale business workflow, all the way from taking orders and collecting payments to securing repeat orders, ensuring seamless and efficient operations.
[Hire an AI Workforce](https://www.hireseals.ai/</contact>)[Request Demo →](https://www.hireseals.ai/</contact>)
![App screenshot](https://temporal-seels.s3.eu-west-2.amazonaws.com/landing/AI-Employees.png)![App screenshot](https://temporal-seels.s3.eu-west-2.amazonaws.com/landing/agents-vertical-mobile.png)
## AI Employees
AI Sales
Takes orders from email, phone, and WhatsApp, generates and sends quotes instantly, and enters purchase orders (POs) directly into your ERP systems. By running sales 24/7 smoothly and efficiently, you close more deals and grow your revenue.
AI Retention
Drives repeat business by re-engaging your existing customer base with targeted recommendations, upselling, and cross-selling. This approach ensures consistent reordering, increasing long-term revenue growth.
AI Support
Handles customer support through phone, email, and WhatsApp. Provides real-time order updates and quickly resolves customer issues, ensuring strong relationships with instant responses.

![App screenshot](https://temporal-seels.s3.eu-west-2.amazonaws.com/landing/Section-3.png)

generated_description:
**Seals AI**  
Founded in 2024, Seals AI is on a mission to bring automation to wholesalers and distributors through a suite of AI employees. The core idea is to replace time-consuming manual tasks—like quoting, order taking, and data entry—with smart software that can manage all these operations efficiently. With around 700,000 wholesalers in the U.S. still relying heavily on outdated practices, this presents a monumental opportunity for cost savings and productivity boosts.

The team behind Seals AI consists of three Computer Science graduates with notable experience in the tech industry. Fernando, one of the co-founders, played a critical role in launching AT&T's operations in Mexico, driving it to a whopping $120 million ARR. They previously collaborated at a Y Combinator-backed startup, where they successfully navigated the intricacies of B2B sales and processed thousands of purchase orders.

Seals AI aims to revolutionize the B2B supply chain landscape, where communication often happens via phone or email and numerous tasks remain manual. By integrating AI agents capable of interacting through various means—phone, email, SMS, and even WhatsApp—the company is positioned to help businesses turn approximately $100 billion of payroll expenses into software spending. This could redefine how wholesalers operate, making them more agile and profitable.

Located in San Francisco and currently part of the YCombinator S24 batch, Seals AI is a lean team of four, backed by industry experts. Their AI offerings include specialized roles like AI Sales, which handles orders and quotes; AI Retention, focused on customer engagement; and AI Support, ensuring customer issues are resolved swiftly. This holistic approach promises to drive sales and enhance customer relationships, all while providing real-time monitoring and management of business workflows.

In summary, Seals AI is not just another software company; it's a visionary player aiming to transform the wholesale and distribution sector through the power of AI. If you're interested in bringing efficiency to your operations, you might want to check them out at [hireseals.ai](https://www.hireseals.ai/).
